meanings.definition: Of or relating to oleic acid.
meanings.sent1: The chef used an oleic dressing for the salad.
meanings.sent2: The lotion had an oleic smell that reminded me of coconuts.
meanings.sent3: The oleic aroma of the kitchen made everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was smooth and oleic, like a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The oleic nature of the oil made it perfect for cooking.

meanings.sent1: The soap was made with oleic ingredients for a moisturizing effect.
meanings.sent2: The plant oil had an oleic texture that felt smooth on the skin.
meanings.sent3: The oleic appearance of the painting gave it a glossy finish.
meanings.sent4: Her hair shone like an oleic gem under the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The oleic properties of the substance made it ideal for skincare products.
